mapper.sql: ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, AREA_ID, CODE, NAME, SORT, TYPE, GRADE, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, MASTER, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, REMARKS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, DEL_FLAG, USEABLE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, DISTRICT_ID, PARTY_TYPE, STORE_CODE, CAR_LOAN_CODE, SYSTEM_FLAG,CREDIT_PAPERLESS,CAR_PAPERLESS
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jk.t_gl_org a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jk.t_gl_org( ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, AREA_ID, CODE, NAME, SORT, TYPE, GRADE, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, MASTER, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, USEABLE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, DISTRICT_ID, PARTY_TYPE, STORE_CODE, CAR_LOAN_CODE, SYSTEM_FLAG, CREDIT_PAPERLESS, CAR_PAPERLESS ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{areaId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{useable}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{partyType}, #{storeCode}, #{carLoanCode}, #{systemFlag}, #{creditPaperless}, #{carPaperless} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jk.t_gl_org SET parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_id = #{areaId}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, modify_by = #{modifyBy}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, remarks = #{remarks}, useable=#{useable}, province_id=#{provinceId}, city_id=#{cityId}, district_id=#{districtId}, party_type=#{partyType}, store_code=#{storeCode}, car_loan_code=#{carLoanCode}, system_flag=#{systemFlag}, credit_paperless=#{creditPaperless}, car_paperless=#{carPaperless} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jk.t_gl_org WHERE type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag = '0' and useable = '1'

SELECT
FROM jk.t_gl_org as t1 where t1.type in
#{item}
and t1.parent_ids like '%${parentId}%'

select
from jk.t_gl_org where (id= #{orgId} or parent_ids like '%' || #{orgId} || '%') and type='6200000003'

select
from jk.t_gl_org where (id= #{param1} or parent_ids like '%' || #{param1} || '%') and type=#{param2}

select
from jk.t_gl_org where type='6200000003'
and (id= #{orgId} or parent_ids like '%' || #{orgId} || '%')
